ValidationRule.description: Primary Product Field is needed before discovery stage on the oppty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ispickval(Primary_Product_Family_2__c, '') && ( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Discovery' ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Validation' ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Tech Evaluation' ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Negotiation' ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Commit' ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Order in Process' ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Won' ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Lost' ) ) && SBQQ__Renewal__c == FALSE && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Renewal' && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Locked_Renewal' && NOT( $Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Most Recent Product of Interest cannot be blank beyond the Discovery stage
